fields_of_interest: Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Culture, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Sport, Borders and Security
eu_initiatives: social enterprise, gender equality, creative economy, youth employment, access to justice, cultural diplomacy, security and youth resilience, sport, school and higher education
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership: EUNIC, Practitioners Network, More Europe-Culture and External action, the Big 4
goals__remit:
The British Council creates international opportunities for the people of the UK and other countries, and builds trust between them worldwide.   
 
The British Council works in over 100 countries, connecting millions of people with the United Kingdom through programmes and services in the English language, the Arts, Education and Society (Gender, justice, civil society and social enterprise).
